mapper.insert: insert into p_user ( account, userName, password,salt,status,avatar,roleId,email,sex,createTime) VALUES (#{account},#{userName}, #{password},#{salt},#{status},#{avatar},#{roleId},#{email},#{sex},#{createTime})
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM p_user WHERE id IN
#{id}
mapper.select: select t1.* from p_user t1 left join p_role t2 on t1.roleId = t2.id where account = #{account}

select t1.id,t1.account,t1.userName,t1.status,t1.avatar,t1.roleId,t1.createTime,t1.updateTime,t1.sex,t1.email, t2.name roleName,t2.description,t2.code from p_user t1 left join p_role t2 on t1.roleId = t2.id where 1 = 1
and t1.userName like concat('%', #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t1.roleId = #{roleId}
order by t1.createTime desc
